name: Exam Game - Tanks
description:
Destroy the enemy tank before running out of ammo to win. Try to beat all 10 levels!

Turn on wind for a greater challenge. Turn on Lindsay-mode for easy mode. In this mode you can trigger a Cluster-Bomb with the space bar.

Controls:

Aim the tank with the mouse and hold left button to shoot.

Spacebar - explode cluster bomb (in Lindsay mode)

Use 1-9 (and 0) keys to auto-switch between levels:

  1. Introductory level
  2. Black Holes
  3. Homing Missiles
  4. Shield
  5. Moving Bouncy Barriers
  6. Cluster Bomb
  7. Laser Web (partially implemented)
  8. Cinemachine & Minions
  9. Portals
  10. Teleporting Tanks

Press R to reload the current level.

Press Q to return to main menu at any time.

Features (from game spec)

Core Features:

Projectile shooting, aiming (with growing aim line), terrain and player collisions, variable damage based on a direct or indirect hit, ammo levels depending on mode (single: 10, two player: unlimited), and level completion based on either running out of ammo or killing the opponent.

Extra Features:

Projectile has a trail. Lindsay mode (cluster bombs on every level), random wind per shot, sound effects and music, two player mode.

User Interfaces for:

Title screen, start and end of level, end of game. Controls are locked during these screens. UI for tank ammo and health.

Note: multiplayer not fully implemented for levels 7,8, and 10. Laser web level only partially implemented.
